spouseRoom_Victor: Hi, honey. I picked up some books from the library. Elvish and dwarfish lore is fascinating.$1#$e#I love you!$4
funReturn_Victor: Hey! How was your day today?$1#$b#I had a refreshing walk around the farm and through town. My mother says hello, by the way! She's hoping you'll stop by.$3
funLeave_Victor: I'm running errands today. Is there anything I can pick up for you?$1
OneKid_0: Do you think %kid1 will grow up to be a farmer like you?$1#$e#I'd love to keep %farm Farm in our family.$3
OneKid_1: Watching %kid1 play this morning made me so happy.$3#$e#It just makes me feel like everything I've done in my life has led up to this moment.$1#$b#We are actually starting a family, @. Together.$4#$e#I love you so much, and nothing will ever change that.$4
OneKid_2: I picked up more baby food at Pierre's the other day, honey.$3#$e#You don't need to worry about it! Go on with your activities.$1#$e#I have everything handled here!$1
OneKid_3: My mother wants to visit soon to see %kid1. Is that all right?$3#$e#I'm happy you're okay with my mother visiting. I'll let her know!$1
OneKid_4: %kid1 threw a toy at me earlier. Thankfully, I have ninja-like reflexes and dodged it.$0#$e#Okay. It totally hit my face and my reflexes are more like a sloth's.$2
TwoKids_0: I'm glad %kid2 and %kid1 get along with each other.$1#$b#It would certainly be a big challenge for us if they didn't.$0
TwoKids_1: Look at the family we're raising. We're really doing this!$4#$e#I have never been happier in my life. I love you so much, @.$4
TwoKids_2: %kid2 was able to solve a puzzle yesterday, @.$7#$b#I think %kid2 may choose to be a gifted engineer or architect in the future.$3#$e#The puzzle? It was just a... put this star block in this star shaped hole puzzle but... You know what I mean.$0
TwoKids_3: %kid2 and %kid1 made a mess in their room this morning. It was umm... quite the sight.$0#$e#Don't worry, @. I already cleaned everything.$1
TwoKids_4: I bought more diapers for %kid1 and %kid2. You don't need to worry about it, @!$3#$e#I love you!$4
spring_Victor: Spring is beautiful in Stardew Valley. It's not too hot or too cold.$1#$e#The weather during this time of year is perfect. Even the rain just makes it feel clean.$0
spring_1: I smell the fresh scent of flowers and pollen. It's spring, honey!$1#$e#I'm positive we'll have a fantastic harvest this year!$3
spring_13: Are you going to be participating in the egg hunt today?$3#$b#I hope you beat Abigail. She's the reigning champion, so it's fun to see her face when someone finally takes her down.$1
spring_24: I need to put on my best suit today for the Flower Dance!$1#$b#It's fun seeing everyone dance around the beautiful baskets of flowers.$1
summer_Victor: I sure could go for some mint chocolate chip ice cream!$1#$b#We should visit Alex at the ice cream stand by the library soon, @.$3
summer_1: Summer is finally here! This nice sunny weather will give me an excuse to go outside more.$1
summer_11: Do you know what ingredient you're adding to the soup today, @?$3#$b#Whatever it is, I'm positive it'll make the soup delicious!$2#$e#Just as long as it isn't mushrooms. I hate mushrooms.$6
summer_28: We should hold hands tonight on the dock as we watch the moonlight jellies.$4
fall_Victor: I've been craving pumpkin pie lately. Maybe I'll stop by Pierre's soon to pick up the ingredients.$0#$e#It would be a wonderful dessert to have with dinner, wouldn't you say?$1
fall_1: Ah, fall! My favorite season! I enjoy taking strolls around town in the chilly weather.$1#$e#The colors of the valley seem to grow more beautiful every year.$3
fall_16: Good luck today with your grange display at the Stardew Valley fair!$3#$b#You're going to beat Pierre. I can feel it!$1
fall_27: Happy spoop day, honey! If you hold my hand, maybe I can get past the monsters in the maze this year!$1
winter_Victor: Let me know when you want to have a snowball fight, @. I won't go easy on you!$3#$e#Okay, maybe I'll let you win once or twice.$4
winter_1: That snowstorm last night blanketed the entire valley. Stay bundled up, okay?$6#$e#If you catch a cold during the winter, I'll take care of you.$3
winter_8: The ice fishing contest is today, @.$1#$b#We should start heading out there soon so we can walk with the others to the fishing spot!$1
winter_12: We should build a snowman! I think it'd look great in our backyard.$1
winter_25: Merry Winter Star, love. I have a very special present for you later tonight.$4#$e#I can't tell you what it is until later.$1#$b#It'll be well worth it. I promise!$4
Indoor_Day_Victor: I'm debating about what I should do today.$1#$e#Perhaps starting a new book?$3
Indoor_Day_0: Hi, love! How are you today?$1#$b#I'm trying to decide if I should play some video games, continue reading my book, or work on a project.$0#$e#I'll decide eventually. Good luck with your farmwork!$1
Indoor_Day_1: I'm famished. I wonder what's in the fridge... I hope there's spaghetti!$3#$e#I swear I could live off of that stuff forever and never get tired of it.$1
Indoor_Day_2: I was in a productive mood, so I cleaned the house. There isn't a speck of dust anywhere!$1#$e#If you find a speck of dust, I will bravely vanquish it with my duster!$5
Indoor_Day_3: You've been working so hard lately.$3#$b#I want to give you some money to buy a drink at the saloon.[336]$1#$e#You deserve it. I love you.$4
Indoor_Day_4: Living on the farm with you is a magical experience.$3#$b#I hope it is for you too, honey.$1#$e#Let's make today even better than yesterday.$1
Outdoor_Victor: I picked up a health tonic from Doctor Harvey for you.$1#$b#This will energize your body so you can get more work done.[349]$1#$e#Have a splendid day!$3
Outdoor_0: It's good to step outside from time to time, even though I have work I should be getting done.$3
Outdoor_1: Your grandpa was lucky to secure so much farmland here in Stardew Valley.$0#$b#It wouldn't be possible to buy this much land nowadays, unless you had tens of millions to spend.$6#$e#I'm happy you decided to give farming a shot instead of selling the land, @!$1
Outdoor_2: Hi, love. I'm just taking a quick breather out here. Don't let me distract you from your work!$1#$e#We should have extra cuddles tonight!$4
Outdoor_3: It's wonderful to see you out here.$3#$e#You caught me in the middle of daydreaming.$1
Outdoor_4: I enjoy looking out over the farm from the patio. You've made so much progress.$3#$e#You should be proud!$1
Rainy_Day_0: Since it's raining, I might as well finish the novel I'm reading.$0#$e#Hey, I have a secret to tell you.$3#$e#You're my favorite everything. I love you.$4#$e#Eh... that might have been a little cheesy, but it did put a smile on your face.$3
Rainy_Day_1: I enjoy rainy days like this. It gives me an excuse to stay inside all day.$3
Rainy_Day_2: If you're going outside, make sure to stay dry. I don't want you getting sick.$6#$e#If you get sick I'll take care of you.$1
Rainy_Day_3: Weather like this is a perfect opportunity for me to work on my bridge schematics.$3#$e#Don't let the weather stop you from accomplishing what you need to do today. Go at it!$1
indoor_Night_Victor: Are you ready to sleep? I'm quite exhausted.$0
Indoor_Night_0: Did you have a productive day?$1#$e#That's wonderful to hear! We should get lots of cuddling in tonight.$4
Indoor_Night_1: I finished my rough draft of a bridge design for the mayor of Grampleton today.$3#$b#I need to walk over to the town to show her my work soon.$1
Indoor_Night_2: Come a bit closer. I have something to tell you.$0#$e#You're the best. I love you.$4
Indoor_Night_3: I visited my mother today. She wanted me to tell you she says hello.$1#$e#Oh, she also gave me another bottle of wine for us. We can put this in the cupboard.[348]$1#$e#... Or you could put it in the shipping bin. Whatever you feel is best.$0
Indoor_Night_4: It's dark on the farm compared to Pelican town.$0#$b#The town has so many lampposts that it's easy to forget what time of day it is.$1
Rainy_Night_Victor: Hey! I made us dinner. Enjoy, honey.$1[214 224 228 235 237]
Rainy_Night_0: Did you have a nice day? I can't wait to get into bed and snuggle.$3#$e#I've been looking forward to it ever since you left to run your errands!$3
Rainy_Night_1: I'm happy you're home! I missed you so much today!$1#$e#To be honest, I usually miss you as soon as you leave.$2
Rainy_Night_2: I finished a large portion of my bridge plans for the western bridge repair in Grampleton.$1#$e#I hope the mayor appreciates my work.$0#$e#She usually does.$1
Rainy_Night_3: Umm... I have something to say but I'm a little embarrassed...$2#$e#We should have extra cuddles tonight, @.$4
Rainy_Night_4: After everything I did today, I'm utterly exhausted.$6#$b#I'm very much so looking forward to going to bed.$3#$e#I may also be looking forward to snuggling you.$1
Good_0: I made some food for you! You can eat it now or save it for later.[210]$1
Good_1: I heard about %farm Farm on the news this morning!$1#$b#Your shipments to Zuzu City are some of the highest quality goods they have received in years!$3#$e#I am so proud of you, honey!$4
Good_2: %pet reminds me of my cat, Dewey.$6#$b#I can tell you've been treating %pet very well.$3
Good_3: Hi, love. Here's some money. You deserve a drink at the saloon after all of the hard work you've done![336]$1
Good_4: I've been highlighting passages in my engineering textbook to keep tabs on important details.$3#$e#Speaking of which... are you a passage in my textbook?$0#$b#Because you're the highlight of my day.$4#$e#Heh... that was a bit too cheesy wasn't it?$1
Good_5: Oh. You have something on your face. Let me get it for you.$0#$e#*smooch* I love you!$4
Good_6: I was just admiring the mermaid's pendant you gave me.$3#$b#I'll never take it off.$4#$e#Okay, I'll take it off when I shower, but that's it!$0
Good_7: I brewed some coffee for us. Here! Have a cup! I poured it into your favorite mug.[395]$1
Good_8: My mother gave us a bottle of wine from her cellar. This is a vintage from Abeja Vineyard![348]$1#$e#Maybe we could drink this tonight with dinner?$3
Good_9: I don't think I ever want to move away from Stardew Valley.$0#$b#I could make more money in a city but...$2#$b#I want to stay here with you forever.$3#$e#Nothing will change my feelings on that.$1
Neutral_0: I got spam emails today about Joja stock options.$0#$e#I think it's because of my mom's search history.$0
Neutral_1: I feel like starting a new save file in The Legend of Lonk today. There's so much replayability in Neendo games.$1#$e#It's... essentially digital magic if you think about it.$0#$b#As much as I love designing bridges, I do like coding as a hobby.$3#$b#Perhaps in the future, I'll become a video game developer? I don't think I'll ever beat the talents of ConcernedMonkey though!$1
Neutral_2: My mother baked us some cookies! Here's some for you![223]$1#$e#These have chocolate frosting on them, my favorite!$3
Neutral_3: I picked up some fresh fruit and vegetables at Pierre's the other day.$3#$b#He always carries the best organic produce in the valley.$1#$e#Maybe we can make some fruit salad tonight?$1
Neutral_4: I'm reading 'The Elemental Wars' right now.$3#$e#Tens of thousands of shadow people and dwarves went to war some thousand years ago.$6#$b#There were many casualties on both sides.$2#$e#The book was assembled from local lore by a number of wizards and witches from various villages and towns.$0
Neutral_5: One of the kitchen drawers was squeaky so I fixed it.$1#$b$Let me know if anything else around the house needs a tune up, love!$3
Neutral_6: I accidentally put my shoes on backwards this morning. I was wondering why my feet were feeling so weird.$0
Neutral_7: I borrowed this book from the library titled 'Goblin Murkers'.$0#$b#It's a book about goblins that live in various mines around the world.$3#$e#Apparently, some of them used to live here in Stardew Valley on top of Corneal Mountain.$3#$b#They're mostly extinct. The remaining ones are mostly servants to corrupted witches that dabble in dark magic.$0#$e#This book's authors are highly educated wizards, one of which is M. Rasmodius.$0
Neutral_8: I think I may visit my mother today. I'm sure she'll appreciate a surprise visit.$1
Neutral_9: Don't know why, but I've been craving a Lunar Horizon cocktail lately.$0#$b#I think I'll have one tonight at the saloon after I finish my work for the day.$1
Bad_0: I had a horrible nightmare last night. I don't... feel so well.$2#$e#Umm... I'll talk to you about it later in bed, @.$2
Bad_1: Hey... You hurt my feelings last night and I'm not okay with what you did.$2#$e#We'll talk about it later tonight.$2
Bad_2: *sigh*... My mother lost money in a stock trade and she wants me to come visit.$2#$b#She's going to take it out on me. I just know she is.$0
Bad_3: Do you think we could have a serious chat sometime today?$0#$b#It's... something serious.$2#$e#We'll talk more about it when you get back from your errands today.$2
Bad_4: I think I got sick last night. I feel nauseated. Don't touch me, @.$2#$e#I don't want to get you sick too! I'll pick up some medicine from Doctor Harvey today.$2
Bad_5: I forgot to save my game and lost a ton of progress.$2#$b#I'm a bit... frustrated with myself right now.$5#$e#Sorry, @... I... I don't feel like talking at the moment. Have a nice day.$2
Bad_6: I've been stuck on a calculus dilemma for such a long time, and I have absolutely no clue how to proceed.$2#$e#I'm... not in a good mood to talk right now.$2
Bad_7: I heard some horrible news about the Gotoro Empire and what they do to their prisoners.$2#$e#They... I...$2#$e#...$2
Bad_9: Everyone makes mistakes. You hurt my feelings yesterday and I'm not over that yet.$2#$e#It'll... take some time.$2
